publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2701 Mr Tom McCabe: Merger of AEEU and MSF—That the Parliament welcomes the merger of the Amalgamated Engineering and Electrical Union with MSF to form Amicus, the second largest union in Britain, bringing the benefits of union membership to over one million people, and believes that Amicus will continue to support and promote training and skills development, pension rights, health and safety issues, environmental concerns and involvement and consultation in decision-making by and on behalf of its members.
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Elaine Thomson*, Scott Barrie*

S1M-2701 Mr Tom McCabe: Merger of AEEU and MSF—That the Parliament welcomes the merger of the Amalgamated Engineering and Electrical Union with MSF to form Amicus, the second largest union in Britain, bringing the benefits of union membership to over one million people, and believes that Amicus will continue to support and promote training and skills development, pension rights, health and safety issues, environmental concerns and involvement and consultation in decision-making by and on behalf of its members. Supported by: Elaine Thomson, Scott Barrie, Brian Fitzpatrick*R, Karen Whitefield*, Sarah Boyack*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Duncan McNeil*, Johann Lamont*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Margaret Jamieson*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Rhoda Grant*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Irene Oldfather*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Angus MacKay*, Cathy Peattie*, Bristow Muldoon*, Bill Butler*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Jackie Baillie*
S1M-2701 Merger of AEEU and MSF (lodged on 5 February 2002) Susan Deacon*
